# Question

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

```julia
using Base.Threads: @threads

function pig_latinify(words::Vector{String})
    @threads for i in eachindex(words)
        words[i] = word_to_pig_latin(words[i])
    end
end

function word_to_pig_latin(word::String)
    first_vowel_index = findfirst(c -> c in "aeiouAEIOU", word)
    if first_vowel_index == nothing
        return word # no vowels, return word as is
    elseif first_vowel_index == 1
        return word * "way"
    else
        return word[first_vowel_index:end] * word[1:first_vowel_index-1] * "ay"
    end
end
```

Usage:
```julia
words = ["hello", "world", "julia", "language"]
pig_latinify(words)
println(words)
```

This will transform each word in the `words` vector to Pig Latin in parallel.
